title: Usman dan Fodio
summary: Shehu Usman ɗan Fodio, born Usman ɓi Fudi, (also referred to as Arabic: عثمان بن فودي‎, Shaikh Uthman Ibn Fodio, (born 15 December 1754, Gobir) – died 20 April 1817, Sokoto)[4] was a Fulani scholar, religious teacher, revolutionary, military leader, writer, promoter of Sunni Islam, and the founder of the Sokoto Caliphate.[5]
